name: Loewe
content:
Loewe Reference

Effortless Perfection! A timeless modernist design meets ultimate convenience. The new Loewe Reference sets exceptionally high standards. An achievement made possible by a perfectly synchronised performance: A crystal-clear Ultra-HD picture combines with outstanding quality sound from Loewe's unique integrated soundbar. A timeless modernist design meets ulti mate convenience, thanks to the integrated hard disk recorder and Bluetooth audio streaming.

Loewe Connect

Perfect video archiving and streaming! Watch one channel while following a second in picture-in-picture mode and recording a third on the integrated hard disk recorder - the new Loewe Connect range takes viewing to a whole new level with this unique features. Mix and match ... to meet precisely one need: yours! The Loewe Connect is by no means one size fits all. It comes in a wide range of variations: four sizes, four colour schemes and numerous stand options. Together with the Colour Kits, the Loewe Connect makes a statement even when switched off. A true original!

Loewe Art

Loewe Instant Channel Zapping ... a new kind of speed! The new Loewe Art Ultra HD range boasts the world's fastest channel changing times. Making it quick and easy for you to flick through channels, to see what's on and find what you want to watch. Loewe Instant Channel Zapping introduces high-speed channel changes, taking beautifully intuitive operation to a whole new level.

www.loewe.dk
www.loewe.se
www.loewe.no

name: Quooker
content:
A true revolution...

The new kitchen must-have. Quooker: the tap that immediately dispenses boiling water. Tap on the worktop, tank underneath. A 100% Dutch invention taking over the world. You can choose between a separate boiling water tap with accompanying mixer tap, or the new Quooker Fusion: a single tap for hot, cold and boiling water. Ultra-safe, super-efficient and available in eight tap designs and three finishes. And if you thought that the Quooker was wasteful, think again: the patented high-vacuum insulation ensures that the Quooker's standby usage is just 50 øre a day. For even more efficiency, choose a COMBI tank, a single, amazingly economical way to produce both hot and boiling water. No kitchen is complete without its Quooker.

Save energy and water

The Quooker's perfect high-vacuum insulation means that it only costs 50 øre a day to have boiling water at hand, exactly when you want it. What's more, the Quooker ensures that you always have the exact amount of boiling water you need. And you will really save money if you choose the COMBI tank, which supplies all of your kitchen’s hot water too. By generating both hot and boiling water in a single compact tank under your worktop, the COMBI eliminates the need to pipe hot water all the way from the main boiler to kitchen sink. No more running the tap for ages to get hot water and you’ll see big energy savings too.

Safe

You have to be careful when dealing with boiling water. Knocked over kettles cause hundreds of casualties each year, especially for young children. Such accidents are a thing of the past with the Quooker, thanks to its childproof handle and insulated sides that ensure it never feels hot to the touch. The water is boiling, but the flow is a fine spray rather than a solid jet, giving you plenty of time to get your hands out of harm's way. Safety and ease of use go hand in hand with the Quooker.

Fusion

Our newest innovation the Fusion, is a single tap which unites both mixer and boiling water functions. Convenient, space saving and sleek. Incorporates a childproof double-push- and-turn handle with light ring.

Twintaps

Quooker’s Twintaps, our matching boiling-water and mixer taps, are both practical and stylish. The boiling-water tap is height-adjustable.

More about Quooker...

Quooker manufacturer Peteri BV is based in Ridderkerk, the Netherlands. Every day, over 80 employees contribute to the development, production and marketing of Quooker in our 7,000 m2 office. We have branches in England, Belgium, Denmark, Germany, Luxembourg, Norway, Sweden and Switzerland.

Innovative

Quooker is constantly improving its products. This has resulted in the development of high-vacuum insulation, the COMBI, the COMBI+, the Nordic Twintaps and our all-in- one Fusion tap. Innovating, refining, adjusting and optimizing are at the core of our company.

Manufactured in Ridderkerk

Our production department is responsible for all Quooker manufacturing. Although a number of components are supplied by third parties, most essential parts are produced in-house. Assembly and quality control takes place in Ridderkerk. Quooker production also offers supported employment for the disabled.

Service

High-quality service is essential to Quooker Scandinavia. We work closely with our Quooker dealers, but we remain responsible for service support. We provide assistance direct to our customers, from sending them extra parts to undertaking on site repairs. The brand Registered as a brand in 1989, Quooker’s descriptive and internationally recognisable name has proven to be a great success. The Quooker is the world’s first boiling-water tap and the company holds global patents both on the Quooker and some of its parts. The Quooker brand represents high-end technology and excellent quality –qualifications cherished and safeguarded by Peteri BV.

name: Segafredo
content:
Segafredo Zanetti Danmark har eksisteret siden 2003, hvor Massimo Zanetti Beverages Group besluttede at også danskerne skulle have mulighed for at nyde den gode kaffe efter italienske traditioner. Frem til 2012 har Segafredo Zanetti Danmark primært koncentreret sig om at levere den gode espresso kaffe til caféer og restauranter, hvilket betyder at vi i dag har omkring 200-225 café -og restaurantkunder i Danmark. Hertil kommer omkring 25 kontorer som ønsker at give sine ansatte og kunder en lidt anderledes og bedre kaffe oplevelse end normalt. Men Segafredo Zanetti skal nu ikke kun kunne nydes på caféer og restauranter i Danmark. Vi ønsker også at udbrede vores gode kaffe produkter til hjemmet. Hvorfor vi nu er at finde i flere og flere detailbutikker. Herunder Metro, Rema1000, Føtex og Bilka, samt udvalgte SuperBest butikker. Under produkter kan du se hvilke produkter vi fører i disse butikker. Segafredo Zanetti Danmark vil ikke stoppe med at levere espresso bønner til HoReCa branchen, som vi også kalder ”Arven”. Vi vil konstant udvikle og udvide vores café og restaurant forretning fordi vi tror på at oplevelsen og starten på den gode kaffeoplevelse starter her. Nu vil vi bare gøre det muligt at også at nyde Segafredo hjemme i dagligdagen. Vi håber at alle deltagerne i GBB Matcherne 2016 vil nyde vores medvirken og deltagelse i GBB goodiebags og på de meget fine og luksuspræget GBB præmieborde.

MVH

Segafredo Danmark

Country Manager

Kristian Kohn


www.segafredo.dk

name: Mumm
content:
Mumm comes with a heavy and deep history, where their champagnes have all been famous for extremely good taste and quality.Mumm House was originally created by three brothers Jacobus, Gottlieb and Phillip Mumm.

Way back in 1827 they formed and named their company P. A. Mumm Giesler et C. What really seperate them from other champagnes and what really identifies MUMM is the design og the bottle; always decorated with a clear red ribbon on all their bottles.

Today Mumm Champagne is owned by Pernod Ricard, like other famous brands like Absolut, Havana Club, Chivas and Jameson Irish Whiskey. At Pernod Ricard Nordic we are very pleased to work with Golf & Business Butler – Nordic Group. We are thrilled that we have been asked to help in celebration of all the winners at all The GBB Matches at Leading Nordic Golf Clubs in 2016.

name: Nykredit
content:
Drømmer du om at købe bolig i udlandet?
Nykredit International tilbyder realkreditlån når boligen i Frankrig eller Spanien skal finansieres.

At købe bolig i udlandet og flytte væk for en kortere eller længere periode er et stort skridt. Hos Nykredit sørger vi for, at det bliver et skridt i den rigtige retning. Først og fremmest låner vi dig penge til at finansiere den bolig, du drømmer om - og vi gør det på samme måde, som du finansierer et boligkøb i Danmark. Det kan vi, fordi Nykredit arbejder lokalt i udlandet. Vi er der i forvejen. Det kommer dig til gavn, når du har brug for rådgivning om forholdene i dit nye land.


Vi lytter til dine drømme.

Med udgangspunkt i dine ønsker, danner vi os et oveblik over dine muligheder og hjælper dig med at tilrettelægge finansiering, opsparing og investering. Vi når hele vejen rundt om din økonomi, for bedst muligt at hjælpe dig på vej, hvad enten du allerede har fundet drømmeboligen eller er på vej sydpå for at søge efter den. Nykredit International er den eneste danske leverandør af realkreditlån i udlandet. Gennem okale netværk og mange års erfaring kan vi tilbyde et veludviklet produkt der er tilpasset dine ønsker og behov.

Vores tilstedeværelse er din tryghed.

Siden vores start i 2002, har vi opbygget et stort netværk i vores udlånsområder. Vores tilgængelighed strækker sig over den franske og spanske middelhavskyst, med repræsentationskontorer i Cannes, Marbella og Palma de Mallorca. Vores lokale netværk består af ejendomsmæglere, advokater og rådgivere. Det giver Nykredit International muligheden for, at tilbyde bedst mulig rådgivning og tryghed i en kompleks proces i et nyt land.

Hvilket lån kan du få?

Nykredit International tilbyder at finansiere den udenlandske bolig med et dansk realkreditlån. Lånet optages i euro med afdragsfrihed på op til 10 år med 30 års løbetid. Vi kan finansiere op til 80% af dit boligkøb i Frankrig eller Spanien, og ligeledes tilbyde en friværdibelåning på op til 80% af ejendommens værdi i Frankrig, eller op til 60% i Spanien.Renten er variabel og baseret på en 3 måneders Euribor3 rente. Modsat mange franske og spanske banker har vi ingen øvre aldersgrænse og vi kræver ikke, at du tegner en livsforsikring hos os. Vi tilbyder en købs- og låneproces tilpasset ikke bare de udenlandske forhold, men også hjemlige forhold hvor alle dokumenter er på dansk eller engelsk – alt efter dit ønske.

Vejen fremad.

Kontakt ét af vores fire international kontorer, alt efter, hvor du befinder dig. Du bestemmer selv, om du vil ringe eller sende en mail. Du kan også tilmelde dig e-nyhedsbrevet International Bolignyt for opdateringer omkring udvikling på de internationale boligmarkeder.

København

DK-1780 København V
